content: as join 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet 3 single_crochet in same st in next 3 sts 3 single_crochet in next st 2 times single_crochet in 3 single_crochet double increase last 2 sts join changing to color c photos a-1 and a-2 break off color a b = 18 sts sl sl slip_stitch st s stitch es ws wrong side work instructions within a-1 a-2 brackets as many times as indicated after brackets note when working the next round you can place parentheses are used in stitch markers in the center st of double-increases explanations or to indicate to indicate corners they will help you navigate the multiple colors corners easier during assembly * asterisk is a reference mark round 4 with color c chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in next st 3 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 5 sts equal sign indicates the total 3 single_crochet in next st 2 times single_crochet in last 3 sts join = = stitch count at the end of the 24 sts row and rounds 3 marbled jellyfish fidget toy © irarott increase 2024 irarott com finishing back finishing front with the last loop on the hook cut your working yarn do not break off your working yarn yet with the last and pull it though photos a-3 and a-4 insert the loop on the hook tie 3 loose ends together on ws hook from back to front through the same st as join and trim them short apply a small drop of permanent grab the tail and pull it to ws photo a-5 as a result fabric glue on the knot and let it dry photo a-10 you have a nice flat edge on rs photo a-6 a-3 a-4 a-10 assembly a-5 a-6 continue to work in the round with color c and a tie the same color ends in double-knots on ws and 3 mm hook diagram 2 page 5 holding the back and trim them short photos a-7 and a-8 apply a small front pieces with ws together and with the front piece drop of permanent fabric glue on each knot and let facing you work the next round through the sts of both them dry photo a-9 fabric glue is nontoxic dries pieces at the same time photo b-1 clear and is washable a-7 a-8 b-1 round 5 chain 1 single_crochet in same st as join single_crochet in next 2 sts 3 single_crochet in next corner st single_crochet in next 7 sts single_crochet chain 10 single_crochet in next corner st single_crochet in next 7 sts 3 single_crochet in next corner st photo b-2 page 5 insert the marble through the remaining a-9 opening photo b-3 page 5 single_crochet in last 4 sts join = 29 sts and chain-10 loop 4 marbled jellyfish fidget toy © irarott increase 2024 irarott com diagram 2 assembly 10 b-2 b-3 slip_stitch in next st and turn work the next row with the 1 2 back side facing
